name: Swapper! Game
description:
Windows only at the moment, may change later.

I designed a board game, and now attempted to program it. I will make a video on how to play it eventually. Right now, the game is player - run, so winning and cheating is determined by the two (or more for some reason) players playing.

It's a work in progress, but oh well ;D

Oh yeah I also used GameMaker to make this Yoyo Games I'll make that more formal later but this description should only be up for about 1-3 days.
